ygData.subject: once in a blue moon post again
ygData.msgSnippet: Once again, my lump sum of stuff. 1) sorry to hear. Yeah. Lotsa meanies and unintentional meanies and teenagers (not meant in a derogatory way-- but
ygData.messageBody:
Once again, my lump sum of stuff.<br><br>1) sorry
to hear. Yeah. Lotsa meanies and unintentional
meanies and teenagers (not meant in a derogatory way--
but they tend to believe they are invulnerable, are
often hyperactive to get started and forget to listen
to long time players.. etc. But I've met a lot of
GOOD teenage players under 16 even.)<br><br>However,
for every 10 mean acts, there are often 5 good acts.
A simple buff, a kind retort, etc. =) It's
definately a mixed game. It's not a perfect game by any
means, but definately fun.<br><br>2) Iskar monk. Great.
However, new players shouldn't play monk. Plain and
simply-- fustration on weight cap. Many ppl don't realize
that they have a weight cap for an AC bonus. If over
14 stones-- you start suffering. Which makes looting
a pain. Also, monks are hard to play. Many monks
and warriors I meet have an immortal complex.
Especially, iskar monks with a good safe fall and feign
death. However, in a group-- that can hurt.<br><br>I'm
not saying don't start with Iskar monks. They rock.
Just prepare for a little bit of being poor Plat wise
for a while, and lotsa hard work, and making sure you
practice mend, feign, and safe fall. =) Sadly, you will
need to find some light blunt weapons b/c hand to hand
is better for you at first but later on-- monks have
some awesome 1h blunts. <br><br>3) Yeah, yeah. I love
my druid. But I appreciate all classes. Grin. I just
like playing druid, bard and warrior best. I can find
a party role for any class. And unlike a lot of
ppl, I find I love to group with any class as long as
it's a balanced party (aka I won't take another druid
if I've got 2 druids in the group already and no
melee, etc). Ppl that say necro's are useless in a
group-- haven't worked enough with necros.<br><br>There
might be a bias towards playing a druid for me, but
that's b/c I like being a jack of all trades in a group.
I do nothing well, but can usually find a niche. I
hate soloing but acknowledge a druid's ability to
quad, and up to octa kite (don't ask. Had a friend
watch it and he told me about it. Most I've seen is 6.
I'd heard ppl brag about octa kiting. Before I had a
friend see it, I thought they were lying. But someone
was Octakiting Cougars. Lotsa ppl on Drinal
complained that day. LOL. I don't think the guy was able to
do it long b/c that's against the rules.
Technically, so is quad kiting.).<br><br>4) That's enough for
now. Too long a post already anyway. Grin. Be well
all.<br><br>Fatehue Prismatic, Drinal server Druid<br>Member of
Tribunal of the Antiquities<br>shooman in RL
